definition.name: O_slice_cell
definition.definition: For a transfer system O on G, the O-slice cells of dimension n are: SC_O(n) = {G_+ smash_H S^{m*rho_H} : H in F_O, m*|H| = n, m >= 0}, where rho_H is the regular representation of H and F_O is the O-admissible family. The slice dimension of G_+ smash_H S^{m*rho_H} is m*|H|.
